mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.sell_point, a.price, a.image, b.`name` category_name , c.item_desc FROM `tb_item` a, tb_item_cat b, tb_item_desc c WHERE a.cid = b.id AND a.id = c.item_id AND a. STATUS = 1;
